front.title: OSPF Refresh and Flooding Reduction in Stable Topologies

abstract.t: This document describes an extension to the OSPF protocol to reduce periodic flooding of Link State Advertisements in stable topologies. The OSPF current behavior requires that all LSAs other than DoNotAge LSAs to be refreshed every 30 minutes. This document proposes to generalize the use of DoNotAge LSAs to reduce protocol traffic in stable topologies
